verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%>. Out of the depths <S%H4615><s%> have I cried <S%H7121><s%> unto thee, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>: let thine ears <S%H241><s%> be attentive <S%H7183><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.
If thou, LORD <S%H3050><s%>, shouldest mark <S%H8104><s%> iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%>, who shall stand <S%H5975><s%>?
But there is forgiveness <S%H5547><s%> with thee, that thou mayest be feared <S%H3372><s%>.
I wait <S%H6960><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, my soul <S%H5315><s%> doth wait <S%H6960><s%>, and in his word <S%H1697><s%> do I hope <S%H3176><s%>.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> waiteth for the Lord <S%H136><s%> more than they that watch <S%H8104><s%> for the morning <S%H1242><s%>: I say, more than they that watch <S%H8104><s%> for the morning <S%H1242><s%>. I say: or, which watch unto
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> hope <S%H3176><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: for with the LORD <S%H3068><s%> there is mercy <S%H2617><s%>, and with him is plenteous <S%H7235><s%> redemption <S%H6304><s%>.
And he shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from all his iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
